name: What I hate about 8: A "Game" of Thrones
name_original: What I hate about 8: A "Game" of Thrones
description:
Like most people I hated Game of thrones season 8. This was a cute attempt to go back in time and change the parts I didn’t like. I could only make it though Battle of Winterfell but It was truly healing. Play as Daenerys(forgive her) accompanied by Jon and meet up with characters along the way! Winter is COMING.

Credits:

Pixel Characters - Lara Alley

Screenshots are from the show. 

*This was made for a prototyping class and is my first visual novel.. pls be kind lol*
